name: Brave Blood - Alpha 1 DD36
description:
Extremely early build of a soulslike for Demo Day 36.

Use the big crystal to enter a random dungeon(might break), kill mobs(one type), kill the boss(recolored mob), win(?). 

Can be played with keyboard and mouse or controller(hopefully). 

KNOWN BUGS: 

(FIXED)Using all of your healing item will cause you to not be able to pick up more even after dying.

(FIXED)Queued action when out of stamina will immediately execute when recovering.

Debug map is broken but functional and if you click on a cell it will teleport you to that room.

Camera might be a little jittery when locked on.

F1 for fullscreen doesn't scale properly.
